hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT dependency FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.dependency.model.impl.SDependencyImpl AS dependency WHERE dependency.name = :name
SELECT dependency FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.dependency.model.impl.SDependencyImpl AS dependency WHERE dependency.id IN (:ids) ORDER BY dependency.id
SELECT dependencymapping FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.dependency.model.impl.SDependencyMappingImpl AS dependencymapping WHERE dependencymapping.id = :id
SELECT dependencymapping FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.dependency.model.impl.SDependencyMappingImpl AS dependencymapping WHERE dependencymapping.dependencyId = :dependencyId

SELECT dependencymapping.dependencyId FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.dependency.model.impl.SDependencyMappingImpl AS dependencymapping WHERE dependencymapping.artifactId = :artifactId AND dependencymapping.artifactType = :artifactType
